stimulusHtml: John recently graduated with his law degree and began working for a local law firm. He enjoyed the opportunity to work with the cohort of new lawyers who were hired at the same time. Before long, he began socializing with his new friends and joined them in ridiculing the older lawyers. Which of the following accurately describes the behavior of the group of new lawyers?
choicesHtml: They are an out-group engaged in prejudice.
They are an in-group engaged in prejudice.
They are an in-group engaged in self-fulfilling prophecy.
They are an in-group engaged in stereotype threat.
